DOC.brief_summary: This study test possible mechanism calorie label might lead people increase calorie intake . The investigator hypothesize calorie label might increase calorie intake 1 ) people infer high calorie food tastier , 2 ) calorie label invoke thought diet , lead people overconsume reaction , 3 ) people try maximize calorie consume per dollar spent , 4 ) calorie label change one 's goal motivation toward food , cause people eat .
DOC.brief_title: Can Calorie Labels Increase Caloric Intake
